name: Duo Akai Ito
description:
Made by Turbocheke for the Unreal Engine Winter 2019 GameJam 

Control two characters , interact with the world and go to the end of the level.

Lore:
Aloe-Vera:
 Lanzarote year 1730, at a wedding party, the volcano erupted, 
burying the bride, the boyfriend with a garden fork pick up the stone, but the bride was dead; the assistants seeing their pain said "poor devil"; he was Aloe and she Vera.

Akai Ito:
The two people connected by the red thread are destined lovers, regardless of place, time, or circumstances. This magical cord may stretch or tangle, but never break. This myth is similar to the Western concept of soulmate or a destined flame.
